BlocklistEntryNotFound: Blocklist entry with given ID not found
ClientDownloading: The external client is desired to be deleted but there is a download using it

IssueNotFound: Issue with given ID not found
KeyNotFound: A key that is required to be given in the api request was not found
RootFolderInUse: A root folder with the given ID is requested to be deleted but is used by a volume

RootFolderNotFound: Rootfolder with given ID not found
TaskForVolumeRunning: The volume is desired to be deleted but there is a task running for it
TaskNotDeletable: The task could not be deleted because it's the first in the queue
TaskNotFound: Task with given ID not found
VolumeAlreadyAdded: The volume that is desired to be added is already added
VolumeDownloadedFor: The volume is desired to be deleted but there is a download for it going
VolumeNotFound: The volume with the given (comicvine-) key was not found

DownloadClientPriorityHelpText: Download Client Priority from 1 (Highest) to 50 (Lowest). Default: 1. Round-Robin is used for clients with the same priority.
DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsAddVolu: Add volume tags to new torrents added to the download client (qBittorrent 4.1.0+)

DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsFirstAn: Download first and last pieces first (qBittorrent 4.1.0+)

DownloadClientQbittorrentTorrentStateDht: qBittorrent cannot resolve magnet link with DHT disabled
DownloadClientQbittorrentTorrentStatePat: Unable to Import. Path matches client base download directory, it's possible 'Keep top-level folder' is disabled for this torrent or 'Torrent Content Layout' is NOT set to 'Original' or 'Create Subfolder'?
DownloadClientQbittorrentTorrentStateSta: The download is stalled with no connections
DownloadClientQbittorrentValidationCateg: {appName} was unable to add the label to qBittorrent.
{appName} will not attempt to import completed downloads without a category.
Categories are not supported until qBittorrent version 3.3.0. Please upgrade or try again with an empty Category.
DownloadClientQbittorrentValidationQueue: Torrent Queueing is not enabled in your qBittorrent settings. Enable it in qBittorrent or select 'Last' as priority.
DownloadClientQbittorrentValidationRemov: qBittorrent is configured to remove torrents when they reach their Share Ratio Limit

{appName} will be unable to perform Completed Download Handling as configured. You can fix this in qBittorrent ('Tools -> Options...' in the menu) by changing 'Options -> BitTorrent -> Share Ratio Limiting' from 'Remove them' to 'Pause them'
DownloadClientRTorrentProviderMessage: rTorrent will not pause torrents when they meet the seed criteria. {appName} will handle automatic removal of torrents based on the current seed criteria in Settings->Indexers only when Remove Completed is enabled.  After importing it will also set {importedView} as an rTorrent view, which can be used in rTorrent scripts to customize behavior.
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsAddStopped: Enabling will add torrents and magnets to rTorrent in a stopped state. This may break magnet files.
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsDirectoryH: Optional location to put downloads in, leave blank to use the default rTorrent location
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsUrlPathHel: Path to the XMLRPC endpoint, see {url}. This is usually RPC2 or [path to ruTorrent]{url2} when using ruTorrent.
DownloadClientRemovesCompletedDownloadsH: Download client {downloadClientName} is set to remove completed downloads. This can result in downloads being removed from your client before {appName} can import them.
DownloadClientRootFolderHealthCheckMessa: Download client {downloadClientName} places downloads in the root folder {rootFolderPath}. You should not download to a root folder.
DownloadClientSabnzbdValidationCheckBefo: Disable 'Check before download' option in Sabnbzd
Using 'Check before download' affects {appName} ability to track new downloads. Also Sabnzbd recommends 'Abort jobs that cannot be completed' instead since it's more effective.
DownloadClientSabnzbdValidationDevelopVe: Sabnzbd develop version, assuming version 3.0.0 or higher.
{appName} may not be able to support new features added to SABnzbd when running develop versions.

You must disable TV sorting for the category {appName} uses to prevent import issues. Go to Sabnzbd to fix it.
DownloadClientSabnzbdValidationEnableJob: {appName} prefers each download to have a separate folder. With * appended to the Folder/Path Sabnzbd will not create these job folders. Go to Sabnzbd to fix it.
DownloadClientVolumeTagHelpText: Only use this download client for volume with at least one matching tag. Leave blank to use with all volume.

IndexerSettingsMultiLanguageReleaseHelpT: What languages are normally in a multi release on this indexer?
IndexerSettingsRejectBlocklistedTorrentH: Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing

If a torrent is blocked by hash it may not properly be rejected during RSS/Search for some indexers, enabling this will allow it to be rejected after the torrent is grabbed, but before it is sent to the client.
IndexerSettingsRssUrlHelpText: Enter to URL to an {indexer} compatible RSS feed
IndexerSettingsSeedRatioHelpText: The ratio a torrent should reach before stopping, empty uses the download client's default. Ratio should be at least 1.0 and follow the indexers rules
IndexerSettingsSeedTimeHelpText: The time a torrent should be seeded before stopping, empty uses the download client's default

LibraryImportTips: Some tips to ensure the import goes smoothly:
LibraryImportTipsDontUseDownloadsFolder: Do not use for importing downloads from your download client, this is only for existing organized libraries, not unsorted files.
LibraryImportTipsQualityInIssueFilename: Make sure that your files include the quality in their filenames. eg. `issue.s02e15.bluray.mkv`
LibraryImportTipsVolumeUseRootFolder: Point {appName} to the folder containing all of your tv shows, not a specific one. eg. "`{goodFolderExample}`" and not "`{badFolderExample}`". Additionally, each volume must be in its own folder within the root/library folder.
LimitToParentHelpText: Enable this if each issue has a separate sub-folder, so that the limit is correctly applied.
ListQualityProfileHelpText: Quality Profile list items will be added with

LocalStorageIsNotSupported: Local Storage is not supported or disabled. A plugin or private browsing may have disabled it.
LogLevelHelpText: Change this to 'Debug' if detailed logging is needed for troubleshooting. Change it back to 'Info' when done
LogLevelTraceHelpTextWarning: Trace logging should only be enabled temporarily

MediaInfoFootNote: MediaInfo Full/AudioLanguages/SubtitleLanguages support a `:EN+DE` suffix allowing you to filter the languages included in the filename. Use `-DE` to exclude specific languages. Appending `+` (eg `:EN+`) will output `[EN]`/`[EN+--]`/`[--]` depending on excluded languages. For example `{MediaInfo Full:EN+DE}`.
MediaInfoFootNote2: MediaInfo AudioLanguages excludes English if it is the only language. Use MediaInfo AudioLanguagesAll to include English-only

RemoteMappingDockerFolderMissingHealthCh: You are using docker; download client {downloadClientName} places downloads in {path} but this directory does not appear to exist inside the container. Review your remote path mappings and container volume settings.
RemoteMappingDownloadPermissionsIssueHea: {appName} can see but not access downloaded issue {path}. Likely permissions error.
RemoteMappingFileRemovedHealthCheckMessa: File {path} was removed part way through processing.
RemoteMappingFilesBadDockerPathHealthChe: You are using docker; download client {downloadClientName} reported files in {path} but this is not a valid {osName} path. Review your remote path mappings and download client settings.
RemoteMappingFilesGenericPermissionsHeal: Download client {downloadClientName} reported files in {path} but {appName} cannot see this directory. You may need to adjust the folder's permissions.
RemoteMappingFilesLocalWrongOSPathHealth: Local download client {downloadClientName} reported files in {path} but this is not a valid {osName} path. Review your download client settings.
RemoteMappingFilesWrongOSPathHealthCheck: Remote download client {downloadClientName} reported files in {path} but this is not a valid {osName} path. Review your remote path mappings and download client settings.

ServicePreferenceInfo: The preference for the services to download from when using GetComics as the source

LongSVLabelsHelpText: Whether or not to use, for example, 'One-Shot' instead of 'OS'. The term 'TPB' will always stay 'TPB'
ConvertingInfo: The "Converting" feature allows you to change the format of your files (e.g. from cbr to cbz). Extracting archive files also falls under "converting"
ConvertToggleHelpText: After a file is downloaded, automatically convert it (if a format preference is set) and/or extract its contents (if it's an archive and the setting below is enabled)
ExtractIssuesHelpText: If an archive file has (most often multiple) complete issues inside, then extract the files inside and convert those issue files following the format preference.
FormatPreferenceHelpText: The list below specifies the desired format, in order of preference

SetPermissionsLinuxHelpTextWarning: If you're unsure what these settings do, do not alter them.
ShowSizeOnDiskHelpText: Show size on disk under poster.
ShowUnknownVolumeItemsHelpText: Show items without a volume in the queue, this could include removed volume, movies or anything else in {appName}'s category
SkipFreeSpaceCheckHelpText: Use when {appName} is unable to detect free space of your root folder
SkipRedownloadHelpText: Prevents {appName} from trying to download an alternative release for this item
SmartReplaceHint: Dash or Space Dash depending on name
SomeResultsAreHiddenByTheAppliedFilter: Some results are hidden by the applied filter
SupportedAutoTaggingProperties: {appName} supports the follow properties for auto tagging rules
SupportedCustomConditions: {appName} supports custom conditions against the release properties below.
SupportedImportListsMoreInfo: For more information on the individual import lists, click on the more info buttons.
SupportedIndexers: {appName} supports any indexer that uses the Newznab standard, as well as other indexers listed below.
SupportedIndexersMoreInfo: For more information on the individual indexers, click on the more info buttons.
SupportedListsMoreInfo: For more information on the individual lists, click on the more info buttons.
SupportedListsVolume: {appName} supports multiple lists for importing Volume into the database.
SvCoverDescription: Image file is cover of either issue or volume.
SvHardCoverDescription: Volume collecting multiple issues of the same story in a hard cover.
SvOmnibusDescription: Volume collecting many issues of a story arc in a hard cover.
SvStandardDescription: Normal volume, so not a special version.
SvTradePaperbackDescription: Volume collecting multiple issues of the same story in a soft cover.
SvVolAsIssueDescription: Volume where each issue is named `Volume N`.
SystemTimeHealthCheckMessage: System time is off by more than 1 day. Scheduled tasks may not run correctly until the time is corrected
TableColumnsHelpText: Choose which columns are visible and which order they appear in
TablePageSizeHelpText: Number of items to show on each page
TablePageSizeMinimum: Page size must be at least {minimumValue}
TagCannotBeDeletedWhileInUse: Tag cannot be deleted while in use
TagIsNotUsedAndCanBeDeleted: Tag is not used and can be deleted
TagsSettingsSummary: See all tags and how they are used. Unused tags can be removed
TaskUserAgentTooltip: User-Agent provided by the app that called the API
TheLogLevelDefault: The log level defaults to 'Debug' and can be changed in [General Settings](/settings/general)
ThemeHelpText: Change Application UI Theme, 'Auto' Theme will use your OS Theme to set Light or Dark mode.
Title: Title
ToggleMonitoredVolumeUnmonitored: Cannot toggle monitored state when volume is unmonitored
TorrentBlackholeSaveMagnetFilesExtension: Extension to use for magnet links, defaults to '.magnet'
TorrentBlackholeSaveMagnetFilesHelpText: Save the magnet link if no .torrent file is available (only useful if the download client supports magnets saved to a file)
TorrentBlackholeSaveMagnetFilesReadOnlyH: Instead of moving files this will instruct {appName} to Copy or Hardlink (depending on settings/system configuration)
TorrentDelayHelpText: Delay in minutes to wait before grabbing a torrent
TvdbIdExcludeHelpText: The TVDB ID of the volume to exclude
UiLanguageHelpText: Language that {appName} will use for UI
UiSettingsSummary: Calendar, date and color impaired options
UnmonitorDeletedIssuesHelpText: Issues deleted from disk are automatically unmonitored in {appName}
UnmonitorSpecialsIssuesDescription: Unmonitor all special issues without changing the monitored status of other issues
UpcomingVolumeDescription: Volume has been announced but no exact air date yet
UpdateAutomaticallyHelpText: Automatically download and install updates. You will still be able to install from System: Updates
UpdateMechanismHelpText: Use {appName}'s built-in updater or a script
UpdateScriptPathHelpText: Path to a custom script that takes an extracted update package and handle the remainder of the update process
UpdateStartupNotWritableHealthCheckMessa: Cannot install update because startup folder '{startupFolder}' is not writable by the user '{userName}'.
UpdateStartupTranslocationHealthCheckMes: Cannot install update because startup folder '{startupFolder}' is in an App Translocation folder.
UpdateUiNotWritableHealthCheckMessage: Cannot install update because UI folder '{uiFolder}' is not writable by the  user '{userName}'.
UpgradeUntilCustomFormatScoreIssueHelpTe: Once the quality cutoff is met or exceeded and this custom format score is reached {appName} will no longer grab issue releases
UpgradeUntilIssueHelpText: Once this quality is reached {appName} will no longer download issues after the custom format cutoff score is met or exceeded
UpgradeUntilThisQualityIsMetOrExceeded: Upgrade until this quality is met or exceeded
UpgradesAllowedHelpText: If disabled qualities will not be upgraded
UrlBaseHelpText: For reverse proxy support, default is empty
UsenetDelayHelpText: Delay in minutes to wait before grabbing a release from Usenet
UserRejectedExtensionsHelpText: Comma separated list of files extensions to fail (Fail Downloads also needs to be enabled per indexer)
VisitTheWikiForMoreDetails: Visit the wiki for more details:
WantMoreControlAddACustomFormat: Want more control over which downloads are preferred? Add a [Custom Format](/settings/customformats)
WeekColumnHeaderHelpText: Shown above each column when week is the active view
WhyCantIFindMyVolume: Why can't I find my show?
WouldYouLikeToRestoreBackup: Would you like to restore the backup '{name}'?
